row.name: UC4RB_OVERRIDES#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_OVERRIDESs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="1" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Overrides Dynamic Properties" tooltip="Map of dynamic properties to prompt (override) on the execution. Property values to override are to be grouped by entity types and names (for components). The following sample overrides some properties on the related application, package and workflow and the components with name "Tomcat" and "IIS". Note: In difference to components application, workflow and package are not grouped by name as we always have only one entity in our context. Sample: "application": { "/ns1/prop1": "value1" }, "components": { "Tomcat": { "/server/url": "http://localhost", "/server/port": 80 }, "IIS": { "/ns1/prop1": "test1" } }, "package": { "/my/prop1": "test2" }, "workflow": { "/my/wfprop1": "test3" } " upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="text">Overrides Dynamic Properties</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_OVERRIDESs.00</entry> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Map of dynamic properties to prompt (override) on the execution. Property values to override are to be grouped by entity types and names (for components). The following sample overrides some properties on the related application, package and workflow and the components with name "Tomcat" and "IIS". Note: In difference to components application, workflow and package are not grouped by name as we always have only one entity in our context. Sample: "application": { "/ns1/prop1": "value1" }, "components": { "Tomcat": { "/server/url": "http://localhost", "/server/port": 80 }, "IIS": { "/ns1/prop1": "test1" } }, "package": { "/my/prop1": "test2" }, "workflow": { "/my/wfprop1": "test3" } </entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="multiline">1</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_SKIP_IF_INSTALLED#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SKIP_IF_INSTALLEDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Skip if installed" tooltip="'SkipExisting' deploys on targets where the package has not been deployed yet. 'OverwriteExisting' deploys the package on every target by overwriting. Default: 'OverwriteExisting'" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_RM.PRV.VARA.INSTALL_MODE</entry> <entry name="text">Skip if installed</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_SKIP_IF_INSTALLEDs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">'SkipExisting' deploys on targets where the package has not been deployed yet. 'OverwriteExisting' deploys the package on every target by overwriting. Default: 'OverwriteExisting'</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>

row.name: UC4RB_START_NOW#
